fields.name: studyId
fields.title: Study unique ID
fields.description: Semicolon-separated list of (internal) study identifiers (cross-referencing to study worksheet) in which the person was involved.

fields.name: personName
fields.title: Person name
fields.description: The name of the person (either full name or as used in scientific publications)

fields.name: personEmail
fields.title: Person email
fields.description: The electronic mail address of the person.

fields.name: personId
fields.title: Person ID
fields.description: An identifier for the data submitter. If that submitter is an individual, ORCID identifiers are recommended.

fields.name: personRole
fields.title: Person role
fields.description: Type of contribution of the person to the investigation

fields.name: personAffiliation
fields.title: Person affiliation
fields.description: The institution the person belongs to
